caption.title: Undamaged leaf of damaged naive plants donâ€™t decrease photosynthesis or produce defense compounds.
caption.p: Differences of P max (a), Fv/Fm (b), leaf nitrogen (c) lignin (d), cellulose (e) and polyphenolic (f) concentrations between damaged (black bars) and undamaged leaves (grey bars) of the two plant species.
